Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Contains all the data connected to the player.
Author:
Riccardo Motta

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, WizardType wizardType, int towersNumber, TowerType towerType, Map<HouseColor,Integer> entrance)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Player's name.
      wizardType - Player's Wizard.
      towersNumber - Number of towers to put on the board.
      towerType - Color of the tower.
      entrance - The entrance of the SchoolBoard.

    • Player

      public Player(String name, WizardType wizardType, List<Assistant> assistants, int coins, SchoolBoard schoolBoard)
      Class constructor used to restore the game.
      Parameters:
      name - Player's name.
      wizardType - Player's Wizard.
      assistants - Player's deck of Assistants.
      coins - Player's coins.
      schoolBoard - Player's SchoolBoard.

    • addCoins

      public void addCoins()
      Adds one coin to preview coin amount.

    • takeCoins

      private void takeCoins(int number) throws NegativeException, NotEnoughCoinsException
      Removes the specified number of coins. Used in combination with paySpecialCharacter.
      Parameters:
      number - Number of coins to spend.
      Throws:
      NegativeException - If the number of towers is negative.
      NotEnoughCoinsException - If the number of available coins is less than the required one.

    • getAssistants

      public List<Assistant> getAssistants()
      Gets the list of available Assistants.
      Returns:
      List of available Assistants.

    • playAssistant

      public Assistant playAssistant(int id) throws AlreadyPlayedException
      Plays the selected Assistant, giving back a reference to it.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the Assistant to be played.
      Returns:
      Chosen Assistant, if available.
      Throws:
      AlreadyPlayedException - If the Assistant had already been played.

    • paySpecialCharacter

      public void paySpecialCharacter(SpecialCharacter specialCharacter) throws NotEnoughCoinsException, NullPointerException
      Plays the specified SpecialCharacter.
      Parameters:
      specialCharacter - Selected SpecialCharacter.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCoinsException - If the number of available coins is less than the required one.
      NullPointerException - If the argument is null.

    • getSchoolBoard

      public SchoolBoard getSchoolBoard()
      Gets the Player's SchoolBoard.
      Returns:
      Player's SchoolBoard.
